content: i designed this wolf to go with my three little pigs the wolf is about 6 5 inches tall to top of ears the wolf and the pigs along with the book would make great storysacks if you make these i d love to see please post pictures on my facebook page amigurumi freely 1 the wolf and the piggies are here 2 1 https //www facebook com/awesomeamigurumi/ 2 http //www amigurumitogo com/2017/01/big-bad-wolf-and-three-little-pigs html
